product_name: Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Folding Bucket
long_description: Why make multiple trips to the nearby stream for water when you could fill up the 10-liter Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Folding bucket and be set for the night?. Weighing in at only 1 oz., the Ultra-Sil Folding bucket is lighter and more packable than the standard Sea to Summit Folding bucket. 30-denier siliconized Cordura(R) nylon fabric is strong and lightweight; fully seam sealed and leakproof. Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Folding bucket includes a small stuff sack for convenient packing. Not designed for water storage because it's not freestanding.
short_description: Why make multiple trips to the nearby stream for water when you could fill up the 10-liter Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Folding bucket and be set for the night?.
